Label: Component type name
Description: The generic name (if any) which is given in the product to the type of section which the content item represents, eg Chapter, Part, Track. Optional and non-repeating; but either this field or a title (in the <TitleDetail> composite), or both, must be present in each occurrence of the <ContentItem>.
Format: <dd>Variable length alphanumeric, suggested maximum length 20 characters</dd>
